levels.description: Stops attacking and sets a burning field at the location of an enemy; ground enemies within this field take <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage and <@ba.vup>{attack@ep_damage_ratio:0%}</> ATK as <$ba.dt.burning2>Burn damage</> every second
